results.description_highlighted: ...In this podcast, you will hear interviews, insights and opinions on matters of maritime ICT, software development, innovation, ship-shore connectivity and cybersecurity.
results.description_original: In this podcast, you will hear interviews, insights and opinions on matters of maritime ICT, software development, innovation, ship-shore connectivity and cybersecurity. What kind of technology and innovation can help shipping companies work smarter? Dualog is a Norwegian company that delivers maritime-optimised ICT solutions for email, data transfer, smart internet and cybersecurity to shipping companies in worldwide trades. The show is hosted by Rune Larsen, Marketing Manager of Dualog.

results.description_highlighted: ...The Compliance Solutions Strategies weekly podcast features regulatory experts, former Chief Compliance Officers, cybersecurity specialists, industry partners and RegTech collaborators to help prepare
results.description_original: A CSS RegTech podcast series on moving from a tactical to strategic approach to regulatory compliance. The global regulatory space is complex and fragmented. Financial firms can address this problem through tactical responses to regulatory deadlines or think more strategically on how to optimize their compliance data, operations and technology. The Compliance Solutions Strategies weekly podcast features regulatory experts, former Chief Compliance Officers, cybersecurity specialists, industry partners and RegTech collaborators to help prepare investment management firms for changes on the regulatory horizon.

results.description_highlighted: ...Cybersecurity is one of the biggest risks to the financial system, and it's been that way for years. So what can we do to make the internet more secure?
results.description_original: Cybersecurity is one of the biggest risks to the financial system, and it's been that way for years. So what can we do to make the internet more secure? This five-part podcast series from American Banker explores the origins of the internet and cybersecurity, the laws and rules that manage cyber risk, and the technologies and policies that could make cyberspace safer ... before it's too late. From the creator of award-winning narrative podcasts Nobody's Home and Bankshot, this is Zero Day.

results.description_highlighted: ...Show Summary: Young, anti-social computer programmer Elliot works as a cybersecurity engineer during the day, but at night he is a vigilante hacker.
results.description_original:
The Mr. Robot After Show recaps, reviews and discusses episodes of USA's Mr. Robot.

Show Summary: Young, anti-social computer programmer Elliot works as a cybersecurity engineer during the day, but at night he is a vigilante hacker. He is recruited by the mysterious leader of an underground group of hackers to join their organization. Elliot's task? Help bring down corporate America, including the company he is paid to protect, which presents him with a moral dilemma. Although he works for a corporation, his personal beliefs make it hard to resist the urge to take down the heads of multinational companies that he believes are running — and ruining — the world.
results.title_highlighted: Mr. Robot Reviews & After Show - AfterBuzz TV
results.title_original: Mr. Robot Reviews & After Show - AfterBuzz TV

results.description_highlighted: ...CISO Talks is a weekly show / podcast which is tailored for CISOs and I.T. professionals but can also appeal to anyone with an interest in cybersecurity.
results.description_original:
CISO Talks is a weekly show / podcast which is tailored for CISOs and I.T. professionals but can also appeal to anyone with an interest in cybersecurity. We discuss a number of topics regarding the CISO and I.T. professional role and how certain scenarios, changes and trends are shaping the role(s) as well as the cybersecurity industry.

If you are a CISO or an I.T. professional or if you just have an interesting topic to discuss on our show then please send our producer of the show, Dan, an email.

daniel.curme@lepide.com

Also available on:
YouTube
Spotify
iTunes

Copyright ©️ 2019-2020 Lepide. All Rights Reserved.

results.description_original: #AxisOfEasy is a weekly briefing wherein easyDNS CEO Mark E. Jeftovic sends out a short digest on the state of the ‘net and how it affects your business, security and privacy. Topics covered include cybersecurity, surveillance capitalism, censorship & free speech, data breaches and leaks, emerging technologies, decentralization and interesting subcultures.

results.description_highlighted: ...Security Conversations is a cybersecurity podcast series curated by journalist and security strategist Ryan Naraine.
results.description_original:
Security Conversations is a cybersecurity podcast series curated by journalist and security strategist Ryan Naraine. These conversations with security practitioners cover a wide range of topics, including threat intelligence, zero trust, securing cloud deployments, penetration testing, bug bounties, advancements in offensive research and targeted threat activity. 
Connect with Ryan on Twitter (Open DMs).
Disclosure:  Ryan is a security strategist at Intel Corp.   Ryan produces this podcast in his personal capacity and the views and opinions expressed in these recordings do not necessarily reflect the positions and views of Intel Corp. or any of its subsidiaries.
